Subjects: husbands, inadequacies in lovemaking; women, as speakers/narrators
_description: The Ten Wives Tales — twenty 6-line stanzas

NLWPork10.First Lines: Leve lystynes to meTwo wordes or three…
NLWPork10.Last Lines:
…Sertis and hit schuld be boghteHe is not worth a nay
                    AMEN
NLWPork10.Editions:
Furnivall,  Frederick James. 
             Jyl of Breyntford’s Testament and Other Poems.
         London, 1871; privately circulated: 29-33.
